freelance.title: Fullstack Software Developer
freelance.description: I spent my freelance period developing the full stack of mainly news sites and e-commrce. This was achieved by working with PHP, JS, SCSS, CSS and primarily the Wordpress and Laravel framework depending on the client needs.

digitalHouse.title: Fullstack Software Developer
digitalHouse.description: Development and mantaining of their Educational Management System. It was a PHP app built with the Laravel framework and the Doctrine ORM. The challenge was to be able to handle such gigantic App and to modernize it since when Digital House acquired the ownership of the code, the app was really outdated. My job was mostly PHP/Laravel and a tiny bit of NodeJS and VueJS.

softVision.title: Fullstack Software Developer
softVision.description: In Softvision I oficially became a NodeJS/Typescript developer. At the moment of writing this I'm in charge of buiding Microservices, providing maintainable and scalable code and the ecosystem the app needs. This app will be available in the web, as an iOS and android app. All environments are hosted in AWS and the management with JIRA.

digitalHouse.title: Fullstack Software Developer
digitalHouse.description: Full stack developent course about the whole process of building an app. The backend side was taught in PHP

educacionIT.title: The Object Oriented Paradigm
educacionIT.description: A short course about the principal concepts about Object Oriented Programming.
